reviews.text: Light amber color with white head. Flowery and citrusy hop aroma. Well balanced sweetness with bitterness. Bitterness is pleasant and lasting in aftertaste. ---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap at RJ. Aroma hoppy, citrus fruits, orange. Lightly grassy. Clear golden colour, solid white head. Taste is hoppy, moderate bitterness, quite thin bodied, watery. Citrusy, zesty hops flavour. Overall good, but nothing glorious.
Bottle. Amber orange color with medium white head. Light citrus hoppy aoroma with oranges and tangerines. Light hoppy bitter taste with oranges, tangerines, orange zest.
